info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 12:36PM EDT until April 6 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids MI
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan...
Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County.
Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan...
Portage River near Vicksburg affecting Kalamazoo County.
.Two to three inches of rain fell Wednesday, which is causing minor flooding on some area rivers. Another round of rain is expected Friday night and this will keep river levels elevated until they fall for good towards the beginning of next week.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Sycamore Creek at Holt.
* WHEN...Until late Sunday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river, in the Lansing Municipal Golf Course and sections of East Mt. Hope Road.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM EDT Thursday was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 8.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight to 7.3 feet early Saturday morning. It will rise above flood stage late Saturday morning to 8.2 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage again late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.8 feet on 01/12/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING
